title: Down She Fell
author: Conor Grayson
description: Ferry worker Norah's quiet routine is upended when her partner Drew discovers a troubling lapse in judgment.

title: Harlot in Venice
author: Conor Grayson
description: In Renaissance Venice, a young woman caught in scandal faces public punishment in St. Mark's Square.

title: Hudson's Best
author: Conor Grayson
description: A strict governess oversees a punishment weekend for the wayward daughter of a wealthy mid-century family.

title: Joanna
author: Conor Grayson
description: When nineteen-year-old Joanna's reckless night out goes too far, her aunt has strong feelings about it.

title: The Advisor
author: Alex Reynolds
description: A struggling college student changes advisors and discovers that his new mentor has an unconventional approach to accountability.
